page.title: 13HOME LIFE AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: The home life of most of the families is one of a typical{close {knit community,}everyone knows everyone else, and there is a generally satisfied and contented feeling of the quality of life. In fact it is often found that following generations live in the same area. Most families have the{usual {electrical appliances}of television, radio, washing machine, vacuum cleaner, iron, refrigerator, freezer also a telephone and car.{Other {appliances}gaining popularity are household video recorders, home computers, dish washers and microwave ovens. The{pets}that people keep range from their working dogs to pet dogs, cats, goats, guinea pigs, ferrets, peacocks, budgerigars to shire horses.
